page.title: 04Abercynon Childrens games
page.content: Our group found out how children like to spend their{recreational}time.By intreviewing children of different ages we were able to find:- Pass the parcel,Musical statues were amoungst the favourites,most popular was{Fire ball.}You have as many people as you like in a circle who throw a ball to one another.If someone drops the ball they have to run around the circle and the people who are left have got to throw the ball to eachother until the last person to have it tamps out the person who dropped the ball if they are still running.If they do then the person who was running is out. The most popular school party is on Halloween because the children have a chance to wear{costumes}and win a prize.
